name: v0.23.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_jest", version = "0.23.2")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "70f723fcba46faf652b213d7cbfd6cf6e4fba1ea6af86233da89bb131aa1a1d8",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.23.2",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.23.2/rules_jest-v0.23.2.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: use of the bazel supplied list of runfiles by jest subprocesses by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/307


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.23.1...v0.23.2

## What's Changed
* chore: BCR testing on Bazel 6 and 7 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/233
* chore: green up //jest/tests/fixed_args:fixed_args_test on CI by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/234
* chore: remove gofmt by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/240
* chore: fix GHA concurrency check to not apply to main branch by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/249
* snapshots: only create `*_update_snapshots` target upon request by @vpanta in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/246
* docs: bzlmod install instructions by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/256
* test: remove unnecessary aspect_bazel_lib dep in e2e/smoke by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/260
* test: add e2e test example using rules_swc by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/261
* docs: adding troubleshooting.md for common challenges by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/262
* feat(env_inherit): add ability to pass env variables from system by @KatSick in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/204
* docs: add troubleshooting note about ts-jest/node by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/263
* docs: merge troubleshooting docs by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/264
* readme: fix broken link by @mattnworb in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/265
* chore: enable workflows github annotations by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/266
* chore: track bazel server memory usage after test task by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/271
* chore: bump to Bazel 7 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/273
* chore: bump to buildifier 6.4.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/274
* chore: bump to latest stardoc by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/275
* fix: refactor case10 and case10a tests so they don't have duplicate outputs by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/276
* chore: don't cancel concurrent main builds by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/277
* chore: misc cleanup by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/279
* ci: add missing --bazelrc flag to include ci.bazelrc in bazel test call by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/278
* chore: add Aspect bazelrc presets and align ci patterns by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/280
* Merge haste configs if they are available by @colinta in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/281

## New Contributors
* @vpanta made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/246
* @KatSick made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/204
* @mattnworb made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/265
* @colinta made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/281

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/compare/v0.20.0...v0.21.0

* chore: add vmstat hooks example by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/253
* chore: upgrade to Aspect Workflows 5.9.18 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/254
* chore: upgrade to Aspect Workflows 5.9.20 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/255
* docs: bzlmod install instructions by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/256
* chore: upgrade to Aspect Workflows 5.9.22 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/257
* chore: switch to new Aspect Workflows OSS staging deployment by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/258

* test: remove unnecessary aspect_bazel_lib dep in e2e/smoke by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/260

* docs: adding troubleshooting.md for common challenges by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/262

* docs: add troubleshooting note about ts-jest/node by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/263
* docs: merge troubleshooting docs by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/264
* readme: fix broken link by @mattnworb in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/265
* chore: enable workflows github annotations by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/266
* chore: track bazel server memory usage after test task by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/271
* chore: bump to Bazel 7 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/273
* chore: bump to buildifier 6.4.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/274
* chore: bump to latest stardoc by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/275
* fix: refactor case10 and case10a tests so they don't have duplicate outputs by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/276

name: v0.20.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "49c688e3838c855a9acf3b77bc25cfb18bdd70b03ff0810fbfd6353dd6055feb",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.20.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.20.0/rules_jest-v0.20.0.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```

name: v0.18.1
body:
For `WORKSPACE` users that are pinning `aspect_rules_js`, the rules_jest 0.18.x releases bump the minimum rules_js version required for rules_jest compatibility to [v1.24.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v1.24.0). `WORKSPACE` users that get rules_js transitively from `rules_jest_dependencies` are not affected. bzlmod users are also not affected since bzlmod ensure the minimum version of rules_js that rules_jest requires is used.

```starlark
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```

name: v0.17.0
body:
BREAKING CHANGES 

`jest_repositories` repository rule is removed and a new `node_modules` attribute is now required for `jest_test`. This change is BREAKING for all users.

The `//path/to:node_modules` tree target must be passed to the `jest_test` rules via the `node_modules` attribute. For example,

```
jest_test(
    name = "test",
    node_modules = "//:node_modules",
    ...
)
```

You'll need `jest-cli` and `jest-junit` linked in the node_modules tree provided. The `jest-junit` requirement can be removed by setting `auto_configure_reporters = False` on your `jest_test` targets.

This change has the added benefits of not requiring users to keep the jest version used in their `package.json` in sync with their WORKSPACE and not requiring any changes to `rules_jest` to support new releases of jest.

This change is in the spirit of the change in rules_webpack [v0.11.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/tag/v0.11.0), rules_jasmine [v0.4.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/tag/v0.4.0), rules_rollup [v0.14.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/releases/tag/v0.14.0) and rules_terser [v0.14.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/releases/tag/v0.14.0) so the patterns on the downstream rules_js rulesets we maintain are aligned both for maintainers and for users.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_jest",
    sha256 = "a2f35eedce1a59f94b2158b056caab09ed66b92cafabd631b25dac78a178e044",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jest-0.17.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/download/v0.17.0/rules_jest-v0.17.0.tar.gz",
)

####################
# aspect_rules_jest setup #
####################
# Fetches the aspect_rules_jest dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.

load("@aspect_rules_jest//jest:dependencies.bzl", "rules_jest_dependencies")

rules_jest_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* refactor: remove vendored jest versions; user must provider their own jest-cli from their node_modules by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/pull/117
